text:
="preserve">Ferenc "Frank" Arok (; 20 January 1932 – 12 January 2021) was a Yugoslavian-Australian association football player and coach. He played for FK Jedinstvo from 1950 to 1960. From 1983 to 1989, he managed the Australia national soccer team. He also managed St George many times.
Arok died on 12 January 2021, aged 88.
